item.description:
I come to this Starbucks many times a month because of my

Use of local shops and offices a short commute from this Starbucks.

This Saturday, I will stop for a while to have my coffee there.

Soon Rte 1 will become one big Parking Lot so let us get

This Meet Up done before it becomes too late in

The Christmas Season.

This is a separate Meet Up than Swadhi’s,

Coffee Talk Assistant Organizer, Meet Up

That is beyond Hartford so it is too far of a drive or ride

For us on the Shoreline this time of year and with

The high costs of gas.

http://www.forlocations.com/starbucks-Orange/CT/538-boston-post-rd

www.forlocations.com/starbucks-Orange/CT/538-boston-post-rd
item.how_to_find_us: 1 will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have a Purple Back Pack.

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: U Z; Having Coffee by the Starbuck’s Fireplace
